questions.question: Does the edited image feature a horse in the original pose as the protagonist?
questions.explanation: In the edited image, the central element is a prominent horse, standing upright as the main subject of the image, emphasized by its detailed depiction and central positioning. This suggests its role as the protagonist in this visually constructed scene.

questions.question: Is the background set in a post-apocalyptic ruined city?
questions.explanation: The background of the edited image depicts a scene with dilapidated buildings, broken structures, and a generally desolate and destroyed landscape, indicative of a post-apocalyptic setting. Such visual elements are commonly associated with ruined cities in science fiction and post-apocalyptic genres.

questions.question: Does the title "LAST RIDE" appear at the top of the image with a cool-tone filter?
questions.explanation: The title 'LAST RIDE' is prominently displayed at the top of the image. The entire image, including the title text, is overlaid with a bluish filter, which is characteristic of a cool tone, giving the image a cold and dramatic feel.

questions.question: Is there a film rating label present in the edited image?
questions.explanation: In the lower section of the edited image, there is a label that contains what appears to be a film rating or certification information, a common element in movie posters to indicate suitability for audiences.

questions.question: Has the entire image been filtered with a cool tone?
questions.explanation: The overall color palette of the image has been adjusted to a blue hue, indicating the use of a cool-tone filter. This transformation affects the entire image, contributing to the filmic and dramatic appearance typical for city landscapes in visual media.
